mapper.insert: insert into calendar(title, start, end, allday, idNo, color) values(#{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allDay}, #{idNo}, #{color})
insert into calendar(title, start, end, allday, idNo, groupNo, CalendarType, color) values(#{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allDay}, #{idNo} ,#{groupNo}, 'group', #{color})
mapper.delete: delete from calendar where title=#{title} and start=#{start};
mapper.select: select title, start, end, allday, groupNo from calendar where idNo=#{idNo}
select * from calendar where idNo=#{idNo} AND calendarType='individual'
select * from calendar where groupNo=#{groupNo} AND calendarType='group'
mapper.update: update calendar set `start` = #{calendarDTO.start}, `end` = #{calendarDTO.end} where title=#{oldCalendarDTO.title} and `start`=#{oldCalendarDTO.start} and `end`=#{oldCalendarDTO.end}
mapper.select: select * from calendar where curdate() <= `start` and idNo= #{idNo} and CalendarType='individual' ORDER BY end
